headline: Stellar Performance From XLM as It Posts Top 24H Percentage Gain Among Top 20 Cryptos
summary: On Saturday, Stellar's XLM surged 6% to $0.3880, making it the top performer by percent change among the top 20 cryptocurrencies by market cap.

headline: Get Up to Speed on Stablecoins and Why They're the Hottest Thing in Crypto This Summer
summary: Think you know everything about cryptocurrencies? Find out why stablecoins are getting so much attention in the investing world right now.
